entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is one of the Weasley brothers who emerges from the tent to help the Ministry.

entities.name: charlie
entities.description: Charlie is another Weasley brother who comes out to assist in the situation.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is a member of the Weasley family who joins his brothers in helping the Ministry.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is an adult who takes charge and instructs the children to go into the woods while he deals with the situation at hand.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The Ministry is a governing body that needs assistance from the Weasleys and others in dealing with an issue.

entities.name: roberts family
entities.description: The Roberts family is a location where some of the crowd is gathering.

relationships.description: Bill and his brothers are going to help the Ministry in dealing with an issue.
Mr. Weasley instructs Bill and his brothers to go into the woods while he deals with the situation at hand.
Fred grabs Ginny's hand to protect her as they move towards the woods.
